title: Create a sankey plot — plot_sankey

title: Create a sankey plot — plot_sankey
text: data data frame like sankey_toy_data. with_company Logical. TRUE, plot node company name. FALSE, plot without company name node. mode String. Several modes can chosen user : "equal_weight" means divide amount loan number products company. "worst_case" means weigh loan assume money goes highest risk product. two products associated highest risk, assume equal weights . "best_case" - similar worst-case scenario just lowest-risk category. "main_activity" - sometimes banks give one sector classification one company. However, data know sometimes products stem different sectors. Knowing bank categorizes product one specific sector, assume bank finance product sector categories company .

title: Create a sankey plot — plot_sankey
code: # Plot with equal weight and with company name plot_sankey(sankey_toy_data)   # Plot with best_case weight plot_sankey(sankey_toy_data, mode = "best_case")
